main event: An unidentified flying object was sighted north of Midway on an eastbound course by two officers on June 20, 1963.
interesting points: The object glowed with a reddish tint., The sighting lasted for approximately 10 minutes., The object tracked around 40 degrees of arc during the observation., There were no other aircraft in the area according to Honolulu center reports., The conclusion suggested it was probably a satellite.
sighted object: unidentified flying object glowing with reddish tint
